backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling inquiries, admin emails, and contact info with CRUD-like functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature changes, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing the purpose of each frontend file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper configuring providers and rendering all page sections.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Floating WhatsApp action button linking to business contact number with tooltip.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing the business with three feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form section handling validation, submission via a mutate hook, and displaying business contact info.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Footer with business details, social links, quick navigation, and a smooth-scroll handler.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Image gallery displaying project photos with modal previews using a dialog component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, branding, stats, and quick action buttons for calling or contacting.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Service listing section showing multiple welding and fabrication services with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Section highlighting key reasons to choose the business, presented as a grid of bullet points.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with circular logo, smooth scrolling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/config/business.ts: Defines business metadata including contact details, working hours, and social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity changes, invalidating dependent queries on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity data, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook to submit inquiries through an actor and invalidates the inquiries query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for an industrial dark theme with accent utilities and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, typography, and container settings using CSS variableâ€‘driven design.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, design notes, and features for building the SK Welding Works website.
